attributes.additional_details:
Tired of Hearing the same songs and artists over and over again? with the same generic nonsense lyrics, promoting big business and alcohol consumption?

we need an industry that supports real artists who write their own music from their heart like we used to have since 1990 the music industry has been exclusive to only those willing to sell themselves out to big music labels like Sony and universal. this has destroyed the diversity of music and the evolvement of music as a whole take a stand to preserve every humans right to GOOD HEARTFELT MUSIC!"
DOWN WITH RHIANNA AND JAY -Z!
